    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        A player without name is created. His hand is empty and the state is EndTurn (he cant do anything). Since no map or tile has been created, this player has not been positioned on any tile

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name)
        A player with a name is created. His hand is empty and the state is EndTurn (he cant do anything). Since no map or tile has been created, this player has not been positioned on any tile
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              State s)

      • pickUpWeapon

        public void pickUpWeapon​(WeaponCard w)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Add the weapon to the player hand if he has less then 3 weapons. If the player has more than three weapons, this method throws an exception
        Parameters:
        w - weapon that has to be picked
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the player has already 4 weapons
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the weapon is null

      • throwPowerUp

        public PowerUpCard throwPowerUp​(PowerUpCard p)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws away the power up. The power up will be no longer in the hand of the player.
        Parameters:
        p - copy of the power up that has to be thrown away
        Returns:
        the power up that has to be thrown away
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the power up is not in the hand of the player

      • useAmmoCard

        public void useAmmoCard​(AmmoCard card,
                        Deck<PowerUpCard> deck)
        useAmmoCard reload the loader and if necessary or possible draw a PowerUp
        Parameters:
        card - AmmoCard to use
        deck - PowerUp deck of the match

        Parameters:

      • pickUpAmmoCard

        public void pickUpAmmoCard()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method picks up the Ammo card in the current tile. The legality of this action must be controlled before calling this method. The ammoCard is used (passed to the loader). The player draws a powerUp if the drawPowerUp is true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setTile

        public void setTile​(Tile tile)
        THis is the constructor of tile,needed later on other classes to grab players or visible tiles.

      • move

        public void move​(Movement movement)
        moves a player of a given path if it is possible
        Parameters:
        movement - Movement containing the list of moves to do

      • weaponsToString

        public java.lang.String weaponsToString()
